metadata.title: Armourlite Phantom Shatterproof Scratch Resistant Glass Tritium Watch
features: Quality movement with TEN 10 year battery life
description: Armourlite Phantom, shatterproof scratch resistant high impact resistant glass tritium watch made to withstand the abuse of the profession. Phantom dial makes this one unbeatable combination. These watches are equipped with tritium gas that lights up all day and night without any external power source. Quality movement with TEN 10 year battery life assures the accuracy of time and the reliability you need while on the job. Large 3mm crown makes it very easy to change the time. The watch measures 45mm wide and when you add the crown an additional 3mm. The watch is made from heavy grade stainless steel with a special Black PVD coating. The markers by the numbers light up in green as well as the hands. 100m water resistant. 2 years warranty.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "5.3 x 5.1 x 3.4 inches; 2.6 Pounds", "Item model number": "AL48", "Department": "mens", "Date First Available": "July 31, 2010", "Manufacturer": "Armourlite"}
